name: Garden Trowel
description: Durable stainless steel trowel for all your gardening needs.
details: This stainless steel trowel is perfect for planting, transplanting, and general garden maintenance. The ergonomic handle provides comfort for extended use.

name: Potting Soil 20L
description: Nutrient-rich potting soil for healthy plant growth.
details: Enriched with essential nutrients to promote robust plant growth. Suitable for flowers, vegetables, and herbs.

reviews.comment: Best soil I've used for my roses!
Good quality but a bit pricey.

name: Rose Plant
description: Beautiful blooming rose plant for your garden.
details: Comes in a 1-gallon pot. With proper care, it will bloom multiple times a year.

name: Gardening Gloves
description: Comfortable and durable gloves for gardening.
details: Made with breathable fabric and reinforced fingertips for extra protection.

reviews.comment: Good fit, but could be more padded.

name: Herb Seed Kit
description: Grow your own herbs with this easy-to-use seed kit.
details: Includes seeds for basil, parsley, and cilantro. Perfect for beginners.

reviews.comment: Easy to grow and fresh herbs taste amazing!
Nice kit but instructions could be clearer.

name: Garden Hose 50ft
description: Flexible and durable garden hose for watering.
details: 50ft length with brass connectors for durability. Kink-resistant and lightweight.

reviews.comment: Works well but not as flexible as advertised.

name: Tomato Plant
description: High-yield tomato plant for your home garden.
details: Produces delicious tomatoes throughout the season. Easy to grow and maintain.

reviews.comment: Good plant but smaller than expected.

name: Compost Bin
description: Eco-friendly compost bin for garden waste.
details: Easy to assemble and perfect for reducing waste. Includes ventilation for proper decomposition.

name: Sunflower Seeds
description: Pack of sunflower seeds to brighten your garden.
details: High-germination rate seeds that produce tall and vibrant sunflowers.

reviews.comment: Most seeds sprouted, but not all.

name: Garden Sprayer
description: Handheld sprayer for pesticides and fertilizers.
details: Adjustable nozzle for fine mist or powerful spray. Easy to carry and refill.

reviews.comment: Works well but could hold more liquid.
